attributes.action: Make a price cap on goods sold in train stations and service stations.
attributes.background: As train stations and service stations are the customers only choice in the circumstances, the sellers have a monopoly and increase the prices of the goods to unreasonable amounts, the government should put a cap on the price of the goods to stop this outrageous abuse of customer dependency.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for setting prices.
